name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Eric REISS, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 70 Middle District Appeal Docket 1995

judges: Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
NIX, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA and NIGRO, JJ., would reverse the order of the Superior Court.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Eric REISS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The court being evenly divided, the order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
NIX, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA and NIGRO, JJ., would reverse the order of the Superior Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert E. Stewart, for Eric Reiss.
casebody.head_matter:
672 A.2d 784
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Eric REISS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 5, 1996.
Decided March 18, 1996.
Reargument Denied May 23, 1996.
Robert E. Stewart, for Eric Reiss.
Karen Arnold, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
